definition: not to be worried about/all taken care of
not having to worry about food and clothes (idiom)/provided with the basic necessities

sentences.english: Those content with few desires will never want.
sentences.chinese: 常常少欲滿足的人，纔是無虞匱乏的富人。

sentences.english: The scientific colonies were well supplied not only with food but also with culture.
sentences.chinese: 這些科學城鎮飲食無虞，文娛活動也不缺乏。
